linux.command: python3 -m venv night_pyenv && source night_pyenv/bin/activate && python3 -m pip install --upgrade pip && python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt && deactivate night_pyenv

osx.command: python3 -m venv night_pyenv && source night_pyenv/bin/activate && python3 -m pip install --upgrade pip && python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt && deactivate night_pyenv

windows.command: (if not exist night_pyenv py -m venv night_pyenv) && .\night_pyenv\Scripts\activate.bat && py -m pip install --upgrade pip && py -m pip install -r requirements.txt && deactivate night_pyenv
